column1: RELATIONSHIP MANAGER-CATHOLIC SYRIAN BANK & FINCARE-CTC UPTO 4.5LPA

column4: We are seeking Web Designer Interns, who will be part of the Engineering team and collaborate with the Developer team to build internal corporate sites using the latest technologies. Interns are expected to provide clean artful web designs.Experience in using some of the tools like Joomla,Drupal and Wordpress is essential. We expect you to create exceptional user design experience and have a good visual design sense. Previous experience in coding websites is expected. This role requires a Web Designer who is passionate about turning thoughts into an appealing design. We are a small team of highly skilled engineers and looking forward to adding a new member who wishes to advance in one's career by continuous learning.Selected candidates will be an integral part of a team of passionate and enthusiastic IT professionals, and have tremendous opportunities to contribute to the success of the products. Responsibilities Collaborate with back-end developers to ensure web and app logic is properly integrated Designing engaging and responsive landing pages and Optimizing sites for maximum speed and scalability Integrating client CMS programs and data feeds into websites Employing industry and design best practice through website build process Ensuring website function and stability across devices i.e. desktop, mobile, tablet Working with marketing and research teams to incorporate brand elements and relevant market research findings into website Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off to engineering Conceptualize original website design ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex roadblocks Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps to communicate interaction and design ideas Present and defend designs and key deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices and standards Requirements and skills Demonstrable graphic design skills with a strong portfolio Solid experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps Proficiency in Photoshop, Illustrator or other visual design and wire-framing tools Proficiency in HTML, CSS and JavaScript for rapid prototyping Experience working With Adobe Suite – Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign Excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction Ability to solve problems creatively and effectively Up-to-date with the latest Web trends, techniques and technologies Job Types: Full-time, Regular / Permanent, Fresher, Internship Salary: ₹5,500.00 - ₹7,000.00 per month Schedule: Day shift Monday to Friday Morning shift Expected Start Date: 22/05/2023
